statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE livestock_type='Cow';
SELECT ID, livestock_type, weight FROM LivestockData WHERE weight > 1000 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT MAX(weight), MIN(weight), AVG(weight) FROM LivestockData WHERE livestock_type='Sheep' AND breed = 'Merino';
SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE last_vaccination_date >= '2022-01-01' AND last_vaccination_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ID, livestock_type, breed FROM LivestockData WHERE mother_id IS NULL AND father_id IS NULL ORDER BY livestock_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockData ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT livestock_type, weight, breed FROM LivestockData WHERE weight >= 500 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT ID, livestock_type, date_of_birth FROM LivestockData WHERE breed='Angus' AND mother_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM LivestockData WHERE last_vaccination_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_vaccination_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT breed FROM LivestockData WHERE father_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT id, name, breed, age, birth_date FROM Livestock ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM BreedingRecords WHERE number_of_offspring >= 5 ORDER BY mating_date ASC;
SELECT livestock_id, COUNT(record_id) AS total_records FROM BreedingRecords GROUP BY livestock_id HAVING total_records > 3;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5 ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT id, name, breed, gender FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT id, name, age, weight FROM Livestock WHERE gender = 'Female' AND weight > 250 ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BreedingRecords WHERE number_of_offspring >= 5 ORDER BY mating_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, livestock_id, sire_id, dam_id FROM BreedingRecords WHERE mating_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY number_of_offspring DESC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT name, breed, gender FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 500;
SELECT id, name, breed, birth_date FROM Livestock WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT id, breeding_date, breeding_type FROM BreedingRecords ORDER BY breeding_date DESC;
SELECT livestock_id, production_date, milk_production, meat_production FROM ProductionRecords WHERE milk_production > 100 OR meat_production > 50;
SELECT id, name, breed FROM Livestock WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, breed, birth_date FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 500 ORDER BY birth_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, breed, breeding_date, breeding_type FROM Livestock JOIN BreedingRecords ON Livestock.id = BreedingRecords.livestock_id WHERE breeding_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT id, name, production_date, milk_production, meat_production FROM Livestock JOIN ProductionRecords ON Livestock.id = ProductionRecords.livestock_id WHERE production_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC;

SELECT id, name, breed, weight, milk_production, meat_production FROM Livestock JOIN ProductionRecords ON Livestock.id = ProductionRecords.livestock_id WHERE weight < 300 AND (milk_production > 0 OR meat_production > 0);
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT Name, Age, Gender FROM Livestock WHERE Breed = 'Angus';
SELECT ID, Name, Breed FROM Livestock ORDER BY ID DESC;
SELECT * FROM BreedingRecords WHERE RecordDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT LivestockID, RecordDate, Quantity FROM ProductionRecords WHERE Quantity > 100;
SELECT ID, Name, Age, Breed, Gender FROM Livestock;
SELECT Name, Age, Gender FROM Livestock WHERE Age > 2;
SELECT * FROM BreedingRecords ORDER BY RecordDate DESC;
SELECT Livestock.Name, ProductionRecords.Quantity, ProductionRecords.RecordDate FROM ProductionRecords JOIN Livestock ON ProductionRecords.LivestockID = Livestock.ID;
SELECT Livestock.Name, HealthRecords.HealthCondition AS Condition FROM HealthRecords JOIN Livestock ON HealthRecords.LivestockID = Livestock.ID WHERE HealthCondition = 'Healthy';
SELECT id, name, gender FROM Livestock;
SELECT * FROM ProductionRecords WHERE livestock_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT breed, age FROM Livestock WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM FeedRecords WHERE livestock_id = 2;
SELECT date, condition, treatment FROM HealthRecords WHERE livestock_id = 3 AND condition LIKE '%ill%';
SELECT * FROM Livestock LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, breed, age FROM Livestock WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, breed, age, gender FROM Livestock WHERE age >= 2 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM BreedingRecords JOIN Livestock ON BreedingRecords.livestock_id = Livestock.id WHERE status = 'Pregnant' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, quantity, quality FROM ProductionRecords WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-06-30';
